citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
06/16/2015. According to a facility representative, no one would be available to accompany the inspector during the
inspection process until the afternoon.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
06/16/2015.  According to a facility representative, no one would be available to accompany the inspector during the
inspection process until the afternoon.
